part.narration: 2008. All is calm in the old-studio. Shimizu jumps up and down, laughing hard and grinning wide.
part.line: We're so close! Only two more days until we're finished with Phantasy Star 5!
part.narration: Burst. Through the door. It's Jacques. There are breadcrumbs caught in his beard. He's wearing yesterday's shirt. In his hands is a scratched-and-beaten laptop. He power-walks past Shimizu and Takuya.
part.line: Those are Miyamoto's hands! He's gonna flip the table!
part.narration: Jacques stops. He yells one word:
Nozomi jumps through the door. She points at Shimizu.Interface style change. Nozomi is Leading Character. She follows Jacques.
part.line: Nobody move! This is a commit! Keep to yourselves! Go on!
part.narration: Player control Nozomi following Jacques through the studio.Jacques walks into the table room. He places the laptop on the floor. He puts his arms under the table. He flings it. The table's top slams hard against the ground. Jacques leaves the table room. Nozomi follows.
Jacques runs into the server room. Nozomi locks and bars the door to shield she and Jacque from the bangs and rattles on the other side.
part.line: Jacques, open up! This is stupid!
Jacques, you bastard! People like you are why I left Sega!
Jacques, mark my words: I will have No Clich√© shut down.
This is the only source code repository for Phantasy Star 5.
Once I press this button, nobody will be able to revert to a backup.
Once I press this button, my experimental source code will be added.
part.narration: Jacques presses this button. Nozomi sweats and pants.
part.line: Once I press this button, this game will no longer be known as Phantasy Star 5.
part.narration: Jacques presses this button. Nozomi drops down next to Jacques. Every server's fans blast at full speed and yet, plastics still melt. Lightbulbs burst. Nozomi fans herself.Main Action is fanning.
part.line: So if this game is no longer Phantasy Star 5, what is it?
part.narration: Jacques looks to the heavens. Then, he looks to his palm.
